mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_contents(contents_no, cate_no, member_no, contents_title, contents_content, contents_web, ip, contents_passwd, contents_word, contents_rdate) VALUES(blog_contents_seq.nextval, #{cate_no}, #{member_no}, #{contents_title}, #{contents_content}, #{contents_web},#{ip},#{contents_passwd},#{contents_word},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT contents_no, cate_no, member_no, contents_title, contents_content, contents_web, ip, contents_passwd, contents_word, contents_rdate FROM blog_contents
SELECT contents_no, cate_no, member_no, contents_title, contents_content, contents_web, ip, contents_passwd, contents_word, contents_rdate FROM blog_contents WHERE contents_no = #{contents_no}
